{1: '1', 3: 'The small figure sitting on a giant mech on the screen seems to have noticed the gazes from beyond the screen, smiling and waving at the figures in the real world.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory673.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'The Sage from the Church of Machina?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "That's right. She has given me her permission to input her data sample into the simulation machine.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'She herself was curious about this game, as well as this "Guardian of Order".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'I believe the results of this simulation will be more valuable if we include the Sage as a variable.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'After all, who can say what kind of people and things the "Guardian of Order" will encounter now that she is traveling on the surface?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Echo, bearing the title of the "Guardian of Order", is still wandering alone on the screen.'}
{3: 'Despite having discussed the future and the past with many people, she has yet to change her mind about her goal, marching on toward her destination.'}
{3: 'Staring at a completely different data sample, Dulcinea is uncertain for the first time.'}
{3: 'All the samples she picked are "known" factors to her. Even Lucia, Cervantes\' first pick, was a known element.'}
{3: 'Which means Dulcinea could more or less guess most of the results of the previous "stories." But this time...'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'What will the Sagemachina bring to Echo?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "Hmm... I don't know. Maybe she would take Echo to Venus Splash Park, or they would race around Constellia. Who knows?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "No one has ever guessed what the Sage was thinking successfully... Ah. They're about to meet.", 4: '2'}
